ProjectTitle: Expanding the scope of the human somatostatin receptor as a target in diagnostic and therapeutic nuclear medicine in neuroendocrine tumor patients and as reporter gene for positron emission tomography
InitialFeedbackHistory:
10/05/2023
FWO expects more information than this in a Data Management Plan. Have a look at their template. You can either use a Word version of the template, or use DMPonline. Info and template here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp

08/07/2022
FWO expects more information than this in a Data Management Plan. Have a look at their template. You can either use a Word version of the template, or use DMPonline KU Leuven selecting the FWO template. Info and template here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp
